::Prowl/Killer/Annihilator::

Prowl exits the Ark behind Iron Raptor, looking around at the battlefield. 
The maximals seemed to be losing, and the thing seemed to be deteriorating to 
a free-for-all between the Maximals, Newcomers, and The Alliance.

"Day maxi'!!" Someone yells behind him. Prowl ducks in time for Killer's 
sword to swing over his head. Catching Killer's arm in his hand, Prowl 
sharply pulls it over his shoulder, jerking his hand down.

There is a crack and a scream as Killer's arm leaves it's socket, a 
back-elbow from Prowl sending him crashing against wall of the Ark.

Prowl turns around to see the newcomer gripping his shoulder in pain. Prowl 
was mad, very mad, and that was very unusual for him, ussually being a 
logical bot. He ducks again as a battle cry sounds behind him, Annihilator 
flying over his head to land on Killer, rendering the already damaged Killer 
unconscious.

Annihilator stands up to face Prowl and lunges at him, sword slashing.
